title: WHY I CANT BUY RP?
body: Why I can't buy RP? When I try to buy RP it said I need to wait 24 hours. When I wait 24 hours and then try to buy RP again it said the same thing.

replies.body:
For security reasons, you can only attempt an RP purchase so many times before it gives you a timeout period of 24 hours. Note that you have to wait **exactly** 24 hours **before** your next *attempt*, otherwise the timer resets. 

Give it 24 hours from the last attempt and if you still have issues, hit us up in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
